physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features numerous prisoners of war
 together with two guards. The guard on the left hand side of the photograph has a rifle slung on his right shoulder. The prisoners of war are running on a path that is fenced with barbed wire. They are wearing their uniforms and carrying large items and bags as they are running.

The guard on the left hand side of the photograph has a rifle slung on his right shoulder. The prisoners of war are running on a path that is fenced with barbed wire. They are wearing their uniforms and carrying large items and bags as they are running.
